channel.title: Clashofclans - Esport News
channel.description: RSS wrapper of Clashofclans inbox Esport News

item.title: Welcome to Clash Esports!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

Welcome to the World of Clash of Clans Esports! To help you along, we’ve gathered the most relevant information about the Clash of Clans competitive scene in this article. This will be your go to when wondering what tournaments are coming up and what is ongoing right now, but also for checking out some of the past tournament information.

This article will be frequently updated with new information so make sure you come back here to be up-to-date with what's happening!

Ongoing tournaments

Time for action! Here is a list of all Supercell supported Clash of Clans tournaments that are ongoing at the moment. Whether you're looking to play or watch, make sure to read the details below.

Clash of Clans World Championship 2024

The Clash of Clans World Championships are back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.000.000 on the line & 6 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from the monthly competitions, 1 from the Chinese Regional Qualifier and 1 from the Last Chance Qualifier), this is YOUR chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals!

Snapdragon Pro Series Season 6

The Snapdragon Pro Series returns for its 6th season!

With a $50,000 prize pool on the line, this is a competition not to miss!

  • Participation Criteria: All TH16 players of a season must be residents and physically located in one of the countries specified for their region in point 1.4 of the Rulebook. All players of a season must be 16 years of age or older to participate in the series.

  • Prize Pool: $50,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in SPS's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Status: Upcoming

  • Signups: Open, sign up HERE.

  • Follow the Snapdragon Pro Series on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything SPS Related!

Past tournaments

Below you’ll find some of the past tournaments where Clash players have battled for World Championship titles, prize money and glory. Check out some of the best plays and strategies from the best in the world and learn a trick or two!

Clash of Clans World Championship 2023

The Clash of Clans World Championships was back for yet another year of amazing clashing! With a total of $1.150.000 on the line & 8 Golden Tickets up for grabs (4 from community-organised tournaments & 4 from the official Championship Qualifier), this was the chance to secure a ticket to the Clash Worlds Finals that were held in Helsinki, Finland from the 24th to the 26th of November!

In order to participate, players needed to be at least 16 years old and have the highest Town Hall level.

  • The World Championship was free to play. Players were not required to pay anything to register and/or play.

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Clash Champs

  • Rewatch the entire competition here, or if you prefer to skip ahead to the main event, check out each day's stream below:

    • Day 1

    • Day 2

    • Day 3

Global Clash Cup Season 9

A brand new season of the Global Clash Cup was upon us and promised to be a heart-pounding thrill ride! From Town Hall 16 to 10, there were 10 electrifying divisions to choose from with $19,000 up for grabs for the boldest Clashers. The Gothic Division Champion will won a Silver Ticket to the World Championship Last Chance Qualifier!

  • Participation Criteria: Players must be at least 16 years of age to participate, subject to applicable laws and regulations of their country of residence. For players aged 16 to 17 (16 to 18 in South Korea and 16 to 19 in Japan), a parent or legal guardian must complete and submit the Parental/Legal Guardian Consent Form provided by GCC. 1.1.15. Players must reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local application store and be the sole owner of the accounts used for participation in the league. Players residing in mainland China are not eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: $19,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in GCC's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Closed.

  • Status: Finished

  • Gothic Division (Silver Ticket) winner: Dizi Group

  • Follow GCC on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Global Clash Cup Related!

Clash Champs' Trophy Race

Organized by Clash Champs, the Trophy Race was a Tournament where the player that got the most amount of trophies in a given time won! Starting with Town Hall 9, the trophy race featured an edition for each Town Hall level up to TH16!

Participation Criteria: All Players that reside in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local app store are eligible to participate.

  • Prize Pool: Gems, Champs Bucks & Clash of Clans Merchandise.

  • Rules: Read all the rules in Clash Champs' Trophy Race official Rulebook!

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished.

  • Follow Clash Champs on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything Trophy Race related!

Snapdragon Pro Series

The Snapdragon Pro Series returned for another season, and this time the competition was be even more special - players got to test their skill against other players from all around the world!

With a Silver Ticket to the Clash of Clans World Championship Last Chance Qualifier and a $50,000 prize pool on the line, this was a competition not to miss!

  • Participation Criteria: All TH16 players of a season must be residents and physically located in one of the countries specified for their region in point 1.4 of the Rulebook. All players of a season must be 16 years of age or older by the time they participate in the series.

  • Prize Pool: $50,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in SPS's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Millesime MG

  • Follow the Snapdragon Pro Series on X (previously known as Twitter) to stay up to date with everything SPS Related!

Worlds Warmup 2024

The Clash of Clans Worlds Warmup was back in 2024! Featuring Town Hall 16 and a $30,000 USD prize pool it was BOUND to re-ignite the #ClashEsports scene!

To warm up for the 2024 Clash Worlds Championship season, this tournament's format started with 2 Open Qualifiers where 13 qualified teams (top teams from each Open Qualifier) advanced to the Group Stage where 3 Finalist teams from the 2023 World Championship joined them. The top 2 teams of each Group advanced for a face-off in the Playoffs.  Participation Criteria: All Players had to be at least +16years old and reside in a country where Clash of Clans was available to download in the local app store.

  • Prize Pool: $30,000

  • Rules: Worlds Warmup Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Closed

  • Status: Finished

  • Winner: Synchronic

BLAST Clash!

BLAST Clash was an online tournament where all Town Hall 16 players played for a share of the prize pool.

  • Participation Criteria: Town Hall 16 Players over the age of 16 residing in a country where Clash of Clans is available to download in the local app store can participate.

  • Prize Pool: $15,000

  • Rules: Read all the rules in BLAST Clash's Official Rulebook HERE!

  • Signups: Open - sign up HERE!

  • Status: Finished

  • Follow BLAST on X, Instagram, and the official website to stay updated!

We are always looking for more people to collaborate with and are eager to help our community grow! So if you want to explore running a tournament, start by checking out our Community Tournament Guidelines and reach out to us by email at tournaments@supercell.com!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Team

Apple is not a sponsor of, or responsible for conducting, the promotions or events.

item.title: Clash Worlds - All you need to know!
item.description:
Hi, Chief!

It’s that time of the year again! With the start of the 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship right around the corner, it’s time we break-down everything YOU need to know about how to claim your spot at the top, and become a World Champion!

Let’s start from the basics! We are going to back our roots, bringing back Monthly Competitions with a couple changes from the 2023 format - The 2024 World Championship will consist of the following:

  • Four Monthly Competitions

  • One Chinese Regional Qualifier

  • One Last Chance Qualifier

  • And an in-person World Championship Final

MONTHLY COMPETITIONS

Let’s take a look at how each Monthly Competition works! Each Monthly Competition has three phases:

  • The Open Qualifiers (Phase 1)

  • The Monthly Qualifiers (Phase 2)

  • The Monthly Finals (Phase 3)

The Open Qualifiers are a 6-day ladder competition hosted through the in-game Tournament Hub. The top 128 teams from the Open Qualifiers will advance to the Monthly Qualifiers: A double elimination bracket that will be played until only 6 teams remain. These 6 teams will move forward to the Monthly Finals: Similar to the Monthly Qualifiers, the Monthly Finals will also be a double elimination bracket, where the original 6 teams will battle it out until one team comes out on top and wins the Golden Ticket. In addition, the runner-up in every Monthly Finals will receive a Silver Ticket, guaranteeing them a spot to compete in the Last Chance Qualifier - so don’t fret if you don’t receive a Golden Ticket!

The Last Chance Qualifier will consist of the four teams who earned a Silver Ticket in the four Monthly Competitions, in addition to the teams who earned a Silver Ticket in this year’s Community Tournaments. This will be an epic showdown to confirm the final team that will be participating in the 2024 World Championship Final!

DON’T FORGET! In order to participate in the Monthly Competitions, make sure to sign up during the registration period! Registration for each Monthly Competition runs for 6 days, so don’t miss your chance to get in on the action!

Check out the full schedule below, or visit our World Championship 2024 Schedule for more information! Mark these dates in your calendar so you don’t miss a single chance to qualify!

April Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - March 26th to 31st

  • Phase 1 - April 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - April 13th & 14th

  • Monthly Finals - April 20th & 21st

May Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - April 27th to 30th

  • Phase 1 - May 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - May 18th & 19th

  • Monthly Finals - May 25th & 26th

June Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations - May 28th to 31st

  • Phase 1 - June 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - June 15th & 16th

  • Monthly Finals - June 22nd & 23rd

July Monthly Qualifier dates:

  • Registrations- June 27th to 30th

  • Phase 1 - July 1st to 6th

  • Monthly Qualifier - July 13th & 14th

  • Monthly Finals - July 20th & 21st

Last Chance Qualifier dates:

  • September 7th & 8th

World Finals dates:

  • November 2024

Now, let’s not forget about the whopping $1.000.000 Prize Pool reserved for the 2024 World Championship! While the details of Prize Pool distribution for the Last Chance Qualifier and World Finals is being prepared, take a look at the Monthly Finals Prize Pool, outlined above. Each month there’s a total of $50,000 prize pool up for grabs for the top 6 teams!

You’re not going to want to miss any Clash Esports action this year, and we’ve got multiple ways for you to tune in. Make sure to subscribe to the Clans of Clans YouTube, Twitch, Facebook & TikTok official channels, and turn notifications on, to not miss a single second!

That’s it, Chief! If you have any doubts or need assistance, check out the Official Rulebook! If your questions are still not answered, please reach out to clashofclans_admin@ee.gg to have all your questions about the World Championship answered! Please note that tournament administrators cannot assist with inquiries not related to the tournament, such as in-app purchases or account issues.

Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you’re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Congrats, Synchronic!
item.description:
Congrats to the April Monthly Finals Champions - Synchronic!

Hi, Chief!

After the intense Open Qualifier, followed by the epic Monthly Qualifier, culminating in the first Monthly Finals... The first 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship Finalist team is decided!

After an AMAZING Lower Bracket run forcing NAVI to a Grand Finals reset, Synchronic has claimed the April Monthly Finals Golden Ticket and the biggest share of the $50,000 prize pool!

Congratulations to General X, Simon, Marc, Philipp & Einstein!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of Synchronic's road to glory, securing their Golden Ticket and their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO] 📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

There are still 5 more Golden Tickets up for grabs in the upcoming Monthly Finals and Last Chance Qualifier - make sure to sign up in the Tournament Hub for YOUR chance at making it to the World Finals! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash on!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Congratulations, VM Legacy!
item.description:
Congratulations to the May Monthly Finals Champions - VM Legacy!

Hi, Chief!

The May Monthly Competition has officially come to an end - over the past month, the amazing Clash of Clans teams competed in the May Open Qualifiers, followed by the May Monthly Qualifiers, culminating in the second Monthly Finals of #ClashWorlds 2024…

The Clash of Clans World Championship May Monthly Finals Golden Ticket winner is decided!

VM Legacy was simply unstoppable in the May Monthly Finals - securing ONLY perfect Wars throughout their Championship run. VM Legacy has claimed the May Monthly Finals Golden Ticket and the biggest share of the $50,000 prize pool!

Congratulations to Darkstar, Synthe, Max, Ninj & Fluxxy!

Don’t forget about the May Monthly Finals Silver Ticket winner!

Congratulations to SAVAGE ELITE for winning the May Monthly Finals Silver Ticket! SAVAGE ELITE has secured their entry into the Last Chance Qualifier and another chance to take home a Golden Ticket and a spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

Congratulations to Celinho, Pato, Leo, LoOPe & Bernaul!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of VM Legacy's road to the Golden Ticket, securing their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO] 📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

And just like that, the first two Golden Tickets of #ClashWorlds 2024 have been awarded - but that’s not all! There are still 4 more Golden Tickets up for grabs in the upcoming Monthly Finals and Last Chance Qualifier - make sure to sign-up in the Tournament Hub for YOUR chance at making it to the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Congratulations, Millesime MG!
item.description:
Congratulations to the June Monthly Finals Champions - Millesime MG!

Hi, Chief!

And just like that - 3 Golden Tickets have been awarded and the June Monthly Competition has concluded! In the past month, the top Clash of Clans teams and players have clashed in the June Open Qualifiers, the June Monthly Qualifiers and ultimately one final time in this month’s #ClashWorlds June Monthly Finals…

The Clash of Clans World Championship June Monthly Finals Golden Ticket winner is decided!

This is the third time in #ClashWorlds 2024 that Millesime MG has participated in a Monthly Finals - and you know what they say, third time's the charm! Millesime MG claim the #ClashWorlds June Monthly Finals Golden ticket on the back of a FLAWLESS Monthly Finals run, winning every single War! They will take home the biggest share of the $50,000 prize pool and have earned their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

Congratulations to KingsMan, 0815Teemper, TryHard, Natchoa & Hawk!

Don’t forget about the June Monthly Finals Silver Ticket winner!

Congratulations to MO Shifters for winning the June Monthly Finals Silver Ticket! MO Shifters will participate in the Last Chance Qualifier for another chance at a Golden Ticket and a spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

Show some love to the 5 June Monthly Finals Silver Ticket Winners!

Ahmad, Zkin, Sean, Leo & Imraan

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of Millesime MG's road to the Golden Ticket, securing their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO] 📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

Three teams have now stamped their names into the 2024 #ClashWorlds record books and have claimed Golden Tickets. However, there are still 3 Golden Tickets up for grabs in the July Monthly Finals, the Chinese Regional Qualifier and the Last Chance Qualifier! Don’t forget to sign-up in the Tournament Hub for YOUR chance at cementing your place at the top and making it to the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Congratulations, NAVI!
item.description:
Congratulations to the July Monthly Finals Champions - NAVI!

Hi, Chief!

Four Monthly Finals. Four Golden Ticket Winners. Four Champions! The #ClashWorlds July Monthly Competition has concluded as the last Monthly Finals of the 2024 year!

The Clash of Clans World Championship July Monthly Finals Golden Ticket winner is decided!

After securing a Silver Ticket in the first Monthly Finals of #ClashWorlds 2024, NAVI returns in the last Monthly Finals of the year to claim a Golden Ticket instead! NAVI has claimed the July Monthly Finals Golden Ticket and the biggest share of the $50,000 prize pool!

Congratulations to GAKU, Kazuma, Klaus, STARs & Yatta!

Don’t forget about the July Monthly Finals Silver Ticket winner!

Congratulations to Pulse Gaming for winning the July Monthly Finals Silver Ticket! Pulse Gaming will participate in the Last Chance Qualifier for another chance at a Golden Ticket and a spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

Show some love to the 5 July Monthly Finals Silver Ticket Winners - NYU, sahara, Chihawa, Lincoln & Wado!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of NAVI's road to the Golden Ticket, securing their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO] 📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

Four teams have claimed their Golden Tickets and their spots at the World Championship Finals, with just two spots remaining to be awarded at the Chinese Regional Qualifier and the Last Chance Qualifier! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Rewatch the GCC's Gothic Division Finals - Day 1!
Rewatch the GCC's Gothic Division Finals - Day 2!
Clash Worlds Finals are coming to SuperFEST!
SuperFEST 2024
item.description:
Hi, Chief!

Let’s talk SuperFEST 2024! SuperFEST 2024 is a 3-day event that will host the World Finals of the Clash of Clans World Championship, Clash Royale League & Brawl Stars Championship. It is an in-person, live event that will take place in Helsinki, Finland, where fans can come watch their favorite players and teams fight for supremacy and for their claims as World Champions. As this is the first time that Clash of Clans, Clash Royale and Brawl Stars Esports will come together in one grand event, you’re not going to want to miss this!

SuperFEST 2024 will take place November 1 - 3! Check out the SuperFEST 2024 announcement video below…

-

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

SUPERFEST SCHEDULE

All three events will be played across 3 days and the schedule is as follows…

Clash of Clans World Championship Finals:

  • Day 1: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

  • Day 2: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

  • Day 3: 10:00 - 13:00 EET

Clash Royale League World Finals: 

  • Day 1: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

  • Day 2: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

  • Day 3: 14:00 - 16:30 EET

Brawl Stars Championship Finals:

  • Day 1: 17:30 - 22:00 EET

  • Day 2: 17:30 - 21:30 EET

  • Day 3: 17:30 - 20:30 EET

Buy your tickets now!

Don’t miss out on your opportunity to see history be made! Tickets for SuperFEST 2024 are on sale now - spots are limited, so make sure to secure your ticket as soon as you can!

Tickets can be purchased by visiting the Clash of Clans Event Site

That’s it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you’re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related, and check out the Master Ruleset if you have any questions. All the best clash action will be streamed on our event platform, so make sure to bookmark the Clash of Clans Event Site!

Be on the lookout - More information to come soon for details related to the Clash of Clans World Championship finals!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: 2024 Last Chance Qualifier - All You Need To Know!
item.description:
Hi, Chief!

The Last Chance Qualifier is right on the horizon! Six Teams claiming six Silver Tickets will take the stage in one final bout for a chance to claim the last Golden Ticket in #ClashWorlds 2024…

The Last Chance Qualifier is a two-day double-elimination tournament that will take place September 7 - 8, starting at 14:00 UTC!

HOW DID WE GET HERE?

The 2024 Clash of Clans World Championship has been quite the ride so far! There have been four Monthly Finals, one China Qualifier and two Community Tournaments; five Golden Tickets and six Silver tickets have been awarded throughout the year with the final opportunity to claim the last Golden Ticket coming soon with the Last Chance Qualifier!

The Snapdragon Pro Series Finals took place August 10 - 11, while the Global Clash Cup Gothic Division Finals concluded on August 25, with each tournament awarding one Silver Ticket and the final two slots into the Last Chance Qualifier. Just because the 2024 Monthly Finals have concluded, doesn’t mean that the awesome Clash action is over, as the Last Chance Qualifier is just around the corner!

Let’s get into the details…

TOURNAMENT FORMAT

The Last Chance Qualifier is a two-day, double elimination tournament featuring six teams, similar to the Monthly Finals tournaments throughout the 2024 year. The first two Upper Bracket rounds and the first Lower Bracket round will be completed on Day 1, while all remaining rounds will be played on Day 2.

The six competing teams are the six teams that claim Silver Tickets throughout the year in the April Monthly Finals, May Monthly Finals, June Monthly Finals, July Monthly Finals, Snapdragon Pro Series and the Global Clash Cup. Seeding for the Last Chance Qualifier is as follows...

Seed 1: April Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 2: May Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 3: June Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 4: July Monthly Finals Silver Ticket

Seed 5: Snapdragon Pro Series Silver Ticket

Seed 6: Global Clash Cup Silver Ticket

Now let’s take a look at the teams participating in the Last Chance Qualifier!

As previously mentioned, six teams will be participating in the Last Chance Qualifier! Four teams have been decided from the #ClashWorlds Monthly Finals, while two teams were decided by the outcome of the Snapdragon Pro Series Finals and the Global Clash Cup Finals…

The 6 teams, and their respective players, participating in the Last Chance Qualifier are as follows, listed by their seed…

Seed 1: Vatang consists of Gyul, DP, Frostyyy, KIIIBEROS & LansLota

Seed 2: HTM Esports consists of CELINHO, Pato, Bernaul NTC, Aquiles & Leo

Seed 3: MO Shifters consists of Ahmad, Zkin, Sean, Leo & Imraan

Seed 4: Pulse Gaming consists of NYU, sahara, Chihawa, Lincoln & Wado

Seed 5: Tribe Gaming consists of Cronos, Nebrax, Riqirez, Excosist & Jojo23

Seed 6: Dizi Group consists of Chien, Denden, JaGa, KAI & YueTa

We’ve got a star-studded cast for the Last Chance Qualifier English broadcast! Three familiar faces from previous Monthly Finals will return; CarbonFin, iTzu & Woody, but there is also a new addition! The man, the myth, the legend Judo Sloth joins the crew for the Last Chance Qualifier!

CarbonFin

iTzu

Judo Sloth

Woody

Community Casters will also be returning for the Last Chance Qualifier! See the list of the Community Casters below...

Spanish: Zolokotroko, shioN, Style, SOCKERS

Portuguese: Bruna7Cr, Rafa COC, Decow, Marinaul

French: Optimus Prime COC, Skarex

German: Noobs iMTV, eVe MAXI

Italian: Haplo80, Medda87

Korean: Fada

Traditional Chinese: Turtle

Filipino: Boss LA

Indonesian: BangSkot, Chief Rian Gaming

WHERE TO WATCH

Look no further - the Clash of Clans Event Site is the best location to watch the Last Chance Qualifier, make predictions, and earn in-game rewards! Think you know which teams have the best shot at claiming the last Golden Ticket and a spot at the World Championship Finals? Want to earn rewards by answering #ClashWorlds trivia AND just by watching your favorite teams clash? The Event Site has it all! Sign in with your Supercell ID on the Clash of Clans Event Site to get access to all the rewards you see in the graphic below!

The Clash of Clans Event Site has 8 language options you can choose from: English, Spanish, Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Korean & Japanese!

English

Spanish

Portuguese

French

German

Italian

Korean

Japanese

That’s it, Chief! Mark your calendars and stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you’re up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related, and check out the Master Ruleset if you have any questions!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Rewatch Day 1 of the Last Chance Qualifier!
Congratulations, Tribe Gaming!
item.description:
Congratulations to the Last Chance Qualifier Champions - Tribe Gaming!

Hi, Chief!

Throughout the 2024 #ClashWorlds year, six teams received Silver Tickets across six tournament competitions. In the penultimate tournament of the year where these six teams faced off, the last Golden Ticket of the year and the last spot at World Championship Finals has officially been claimed…

The Clash of Clans World Championship Last Chance Qualifier Golden Ticket winner is decided!

The Last Chance Qualifier was one to remember! After falling to Lower Bracket by the hands of HTM Esports, Tribe Gaming once again faced off against them in the Grand Finals. After two Perfect Wars and forcing a Grand Finals bracket reset, Tribe Gaming came out on top!

Tribe Gaming has claimed the Last Chance Qualifier Golden Ticket and is the sixth team that will attend the World Championship Finals!

Congratulations to Cronos, Nebrax, Riqirez, Excosist & Jojo23!

Rewatch the epic two-day showdown of Tribe Gaming’s road to the Golden Ticket, securing their spot at the Clash of Clans World Championship Finals!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO] 📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

Take a look at the 6 teams qualified for the World Championship Finals…

Congratulations to all players and teams who have competed throughout the #ClashWorlds 2024 year! All six Golden Tickets have been claimed and the stage is set for the biggest event in #ClashWorlds history - The World Championship Finals at SuperFEST 2024 will be an event to remember! Stay tuned to the Clash of Clans in-game Esports tab, Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to make sure you're up-to-date on everything #ClashWorlds related!

Clash On!

- The Clash of Clans Esports Team

item.title: Rewatch Day 2 of the Last Chance Qualifier!
Signup for BLAST Clash!
item.description:
Hi Chief,

An exciting new Clash of Clans tournament for all Town Hall 16 teams to participate is right around the corner! 

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

BLAST is taking esports to the next level with its thrilling events and global reach. Known for bringing together top teams and stars in epic tournaments, BLAST is once again setting the stage for excitement with the upcoming BLAST Bash. During the show, you will be able to watch the best players from all around the world competing in Clash of Clans, Clash Royale, and Brawl Stars.

BLAST Clash 2024 is an exciting online tournament for Clash of Clans where eligible players will have the chance to compete for a spot in the finals.

Format

Players from around the world will compete in 4 Open Qualifiers, with the top 12 teams advancing to a 16 team swiss that will be filled in by another 4 teams that will be directly invited. Top 8 will then proceed to an 8 team elimination bracket finals. Each match will feature a 5v5 war mode lasting around 45 minutes, and each team will have five attacks. Make sure to read the official BLAST Clash Rulebook HERE!

Schedule

  • Open Qualifiers (4): September 14, 15, 21 and 22

  • Closed Qualifier: September 28

  • Finals Show: October 12-13

Invited Teams

The four invited teams that will be joining the Open Qualifier winners for the Closed Qualifier will be the following:

  • NAVI

  • Millesime MG

  • Synchronic Gaming

  • HTM Bra

Prize Pool

The prize pool for BLAST Clash 2024 is set at $15,000. Check out the prize pool distribution below!

  • 1st: $7,500

  • 2nd: $3,500

  • 3rd: $2,500

  • 4th: $1,500

Where to watch

Catch all the action on BLAST’s official Twitch and TikTok channel.

How to participate

To participate, eligible players need to register via the Challengermode website.

Ready for the Ultimate Face-Off?

Sign up for BLAST Clash 2024 today! Don’t forget to follow BLAST on X, Instagram, and the official website to stay updated. Also, keep an eye on Clash of Clans' in-game Esports tab, Esports Instagram, X, and the Esports website for more updates.

item.title: Signup to Season 6 of the SPS!
item.description:
Sign up for SPS Season 6!

Hi Chief,

The Snapdragon Pro Series is back for Season 6!

Test your skill against players worldwide and take home a portion of the $50,000 prize pool. Don’t miss your chance - sign up NOW on FACEIT HERE!

This season of the SPS consists of 4 cups played over two days each - best of 1 Single Elimination bracket on the first day, with the top 8 teams advancing to the second day.

Four cup winners (one per cup) will qualify for the Open Finals. The remaining 4 slots in the finals will be seeded based on the overall Leaderboard.

Next follows the Snapdragon Mobile Open Finals played in a double-elimination with a bracket reset format.  A two-day competition will determine the winner, who will take home the biggest chunk of the $50,000 prize!

Save the dates in your calendar, team up, and take your shot at greatness!

You can already sign up to all cups in the season here:

  • Cup 1: October 5/6th, 9am CEST

  • Cup 2 - October 19/20th, 5pm CEST

  • Cup 3 - October 26/27th, 9am CET

  • Cup 4 - November 9/10th, 9pm CET

Now that you know the basics make sure to watch the tutorial video below and follow the instructions to sign up!

How to sign up!

📺 [EMBEDDED VIDEO]

How to sign up:

  • Register a FACEIT account (All players of the team must register an account)

  • Connect your Supercell ID account to FACEIT.

  • Choose the tournament you want to participate in and click submit application.

  • In the application text box, write something similar to “I’d like to join, my name is [INSERT PLAYERNAME] on the team [INSERT TEAM NAME].”

  • Once approved, you will see you’re invited and need to click an orange button to join the tournament.

  • To create your team, follow the prompts in the left-hand window to invite your teammates to your team!

That's all for now! Make sure to follow Clash of Clans Esports X, Instagram & Esports website to stay up-to-date with everything #ClashEsports related!

Clash On!
